messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Turn on them sweet sweet suit sensors.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: No u

messages.author: Research Director's Desk
messages.body: Anybody wanna get B O R G E D???

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: No thanks

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: I will kill you both in your sssleep

messages.author: Research Director's Desk
messages.body: Don't you mean "FUCK YEAH!!!"?

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Try it nerd.

messages.author: Research Director's Desk
messages.body: GUYS ce IS 100% a ling

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Thatsss it im not sssetting up the SSSM

messages.author: Research Director's Desk
messages.body: I meant to say CMO

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: How can I clone without power you moron.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Im ssseperating engineering from the ressst of the ssstation with a ssshitton of wallsss after i ssset up power have a nice day.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Yo centcom pay for my wall bb

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Toxins Storage.

messages.author: Research Director's Desk
messages.body: I got the secret formula if anybody wants to become a monkey

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Meteor Alert

Meteors have been detected on collision course with the station.
